00047 struct
00048 {
00049       PARSE_STAGE curElement;
00050 
00051       INT8        szCharData[MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH+1];
00052 
00053       UINT16                  curMerge[6];
00054       UINT32                  maxArraySize;
00055       UINT32                  curIndex;   
00056       UINT32                  currentDepth;
00057       UINT32                  maxReadDepth;
00058 }
00059 typedef mergeParseData;
00060 
00061 static void XMLCALL 
00062 mergeStartElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name, const char **atts)
00063 {
00064       mergeParseData * pData = (mergeParseData *)userData;
00065 
00066       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //are we reading this element?
00067       {
00068             if(strcmp(name, "MERGELIST") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_NONE)
00069             {
00070                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00071 
00072                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00073             }
00074             else if(strcmp(name, "MERGE") == 0 && pData->curElement == ELEMENT_LIST)
00075             {
00076                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00077 
00078                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,"MergeStartElementHandle: setting memory for curMerge");
00079 
00080                   memset(&pData->curMerge,0,sizeof(UINT16[4]));
00081 
00082                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00083                   pData->curIndex++;
00084             }
00085             else if(pData->curElement == ELEMENT &&
00086                         (strcmp(name, "firstItemIndex") == 0 ||
00087                         strcmp(name, "secondItemIndex") == 0 ||
00088                         strcmp(name, "firstResultingItemIndex") == 0 ||
00089                         strcmp(name, "secondResultingItemIndex") == 0 ||
00090                         strcmp(name, "APCost") == 0 ||
00091                         strcmp(name, "mergeType") == 0 ))
00092             {
00093                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_PROPERTY;
00094 
00095                   pData->maxReadDepth++; //we are not skipping this element
00096             }
00097 
00098             pData->szCharData[0] = '\0';
00099       }
00100 
00101       pData->currentDepth++;
00102 
00103 }
00104 
00105 static void XMLCALL
00106 mergeCharacterDataHandle(void *userData, const char *str, int len)
00107 {
00108       mergeParseData * pData = (mergeParseData *)userData;
00109 
00110       if( (pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) && 
00111             (strlen(pData->szCharData) < MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH)
00112         ){
00113             strncat(pData->szCharData,str,__min((unsigned int)len,MAX_CHAR_DATA_LENGTH-strlen(pData->szCharData)));
00114       }
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 static void XMLCALL
00119 mergeEndElementHandle(void *userData, const char *name)
00120 {
00121       mergeParseData * pData = (mergeParseData *)userData;
00122 
00123       if(pData->currentDepth <= pData->maxReadDepth) //we're at the end of an element that we've been reading
00124       {
00125             if(strcmp(name, "MERGELIST") == 0)
00126             {
00127                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_NONE;
00128             }
00129             else if(strcmp(name, "MERGE") == 0)
00130             {
00131                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT_LIST;
00132 
00133                   if(pData->curIndex < pData->maxArraySize)
00134                   {
00135                         //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3,"MergeStartElementHandle: writing merge to array");
00136                         Merge[pData->curIndex][0] = pData->curMerge[0]; //write the merge into the table
00137                         Merge[pData->curIndex][1] = pData->curMerge[1];
00138                         Merge[pData->curIndex][2] = pData->curMerge[2];
00139                         Merge[pData->curIndex][3] = pData->curMerge[3];
00140                         Merge[pData->curIndex][4] = pData->curMerge[4];
00141                         Merge[pData->curIndex][5] = pData->curMerge[5];
00142                   }
00143             }
00144             else if(strcmp(name, "firstItemIndex") == 0)
00145             {
00146                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00147                   pData->curMerge[0] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00148             }
00149             else if(strcmp(name, "secondItemIndex") == 0)
00150             {
00151                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00152                   pData->curMerge[1] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00153             }
00154             else if(strcmp(name, "firstResultingItemIndex") == 0)
00155             {
00156                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00157                   pData->curMerge[2] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00158             }
00159             else if(strcmp(name, "secondResultingItemIndex") == 0)
00160             {
00161                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00162                   pData->curMerge[3] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00163             }
00164             else if(strcmp(name, "mergeType") == 0)
00165             {
00166                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00167                   pData->curMerge[4] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00168             }
00169             else if(strcmp(name, "APCost") == 0)
00170             {
00171                   pData->curElement = ELEMENT;
00172                   pData->curMerge[5] = (UINT16) atol(pData->szCharData);
00173             }
00174 
00175             pData->maxReadDepth--;
00176       }
00177 
00178       pData->currentDepth--;
00179 }

00184 BOOLEAN ReadInMergeStats(STR fileName)
00185 {
00186       HWFILE            hFile;
00187       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
00188       UINT32            uiFSize;
00189       CHAR8 *           lpcBuffer;
00190       XML_Parser  parser = XML_ParserCreate(NULL);
00191       
00192       mergeParseData pData;
00193 
00194       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Loading Merges.xml" );
00195 
00196       // Open merges file
00197       hFile = FileOpen( fileName, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE );
00198       if ( !hFile )
00199             return( FALSE );
00200       
00201       uiFSize = FileGetSize(hFile);
00202       lpcBuffer = (CHAR8 *) MemAlloc(uiFSize+1);
00203 
00204       //Read in block
00205       if ( !FileRead( hFile, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, &uiBytesRead ) )
00206       {
00207             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00208             return( FALSE );
00209       }
00210 
00211       lpcBuffer[uiFSize] = 0; //add a null terminator
00212 
00213       FileClose( hFile );
00214 
00215       
00216       XML_SetElementHandler(parser, mergeStartElementHandle, mergeEndElementHandle);
00217       XML_SetCharacterDataHandler(parser, mergeCharacterDataHandle);
00218 
00219       
00220       memset(&pData,0,sizeof(pData));
00221       pData.maxArraySize = MAXITEMS; 
00222       pData.curIndex = -1;
00223       
00224       XML_SetUserData(parser, &pData);
00225 
00226 
00227     if(!XML_Parse(parser, lpcBuffer, uiFSize, TRUE))
00228       {
00229             CHAR8 errorBuf[511];
00230 
00231             sprintf(errorBuf, "XML Parser Error in Merges.xml: %s at line %d", XML_ErrorString(XML_GetErrorCode(parser)), XML_GetCurrentLineNumber(parser));
00232             LiveMessage(errorBuf);
00233 
00234             MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00235             return FALSE;
00236       }
00237 
00238       MemFree(lpcBuffer);
00239 
00240 
00241       XML_ParserFree(parser);
00242 
00243       return( TRUE );
00244 }
00245 BOOLEAN WriteMergeStats()
00246 {
00247       HWFILE            hFile;
00248 
00249       //Debug code; make sure that what we got from the file is the same as what's there
00250       // Open a new file
00251       hFile = FileOpen( "TABLEDATA\\Merges out.xml", FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_CREATE_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00252       if ( !hFile )
00253             return( FALSE );
00254       
00255       {
00256             UINT32 cnt;
00257 
00258             FilePrintf(hFile,"<MERGELIST>\r\n");
00259             for(cnt = 0;cnt < MAXITEMS;cnt++)
00260             {
00261                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t<MERGE>\r\n");
00262 
00263                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<firstItemIndex>%d</firstItemIndex>\r\n",                                 Merge[cnt][0]);
00264                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<secondItemIndex>%d</secondItemIndex>\r\n",                                     Merge[cnt][1]);
00265                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<firstResultingItemIndex>%d</firstResultingItemIndex>\r\n",                                       Merge[cnt][2]);
00266                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<secondResultingItemIndex>%d</secondResultingItemIndex>\r\n",                                     Merge[cnt][3]);
00267                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<mergeType>%d</mergeType>\r\n",                                     Merge[cnt][4]);
00268                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t\t<APCost>%d</APCost>\r\n",                                     Merge[cnt][5]);
00269 
00270                   FilePrintf(hFile,"\t</MERGE>\r\n");
00271             }
00272             FilePrintf(hFile,"</MERGELIST>\r\n");
00273       }
00274       FileClose( hFile );
00275 
00276       return( TRUE );
00277 }
